description:
Y Elixir Eau De Parfum for Men - A Bold Expression of Modern Masculinity

Discover the captivating allure of YSL Y Elixir, the most intense interpretation of the iconic Y fragrance line. This bestselling luxury cologne for men embodies confidence and sophistication with its powerful blend of aromatic notes that command attention. âœ¨

The Essence of Y Elixir

Yves Saint Laurent's Y Elixir Eau de Parfum represents the culmination of masculine elegance â€“ a fragrance designed for the man who dares to express himself boldly. This YSL masterpiece combines fresh top notes with a sensual heart and rich base, creating an unforgettable olfactory experience that lasts throughout the day. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 60ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration High
Brand Yves Saint Laurent

Captivating Fragrance Notes

Note Type Composition
Top Notes Ginger, Apple, Bergamot, Aldehydes
Heart Notes Lavender, Geranium, Clary Sage
Base Notes Tonka Bean, Cedar, Patchouli, Incense

Key Features of Y Elixir:

  • Most intense concentration in the Y collection ðŸ’Ž
  • Superior longevity and projection
  • Distinctive tonka bean signature
  • Elegant glass bottle with distinctive Y engraving
  • Perfect for evening wear and special occasions
  • Ideal for the confident, modern man

The Legacy of YSL Y Fragrances

Launched as a more intense evolution of the original Y fragrance, Y Elixir continues YSL's tradition of creating innovative fragrances that define contemporary masculinity. The Y collection was inspired by the generation of creative men who dare to follow their passions and carve their own path. The distinctive Y-shaped cut on the bottle symbolizes this question of identity and purpose. ðŸŒ¿

This eau de parfum stands as one of the most sophisticated offerings in the premium fragrance market, delivering an exceptional olfactory experience with remarkable longevity and sillage.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Y Elixir Eau de Parfum last on skin?
Y Elixir offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin due to its higher concentration of fragrance oils. The powerful base notes of tonka bean, cedar, and patchouli create a long-lasting trail that evolves beautifully throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on well-moisturized skin. âœ¨
short_description: Experience the ultimate expression of modern masculinity with YSL Y Elixir. This intense eau de parfum blends vibrant ginger and apple with aromatic lavender and rich tonka bean for a bold, sophisticated signature that commands attention and lasts all day.
